ComicInfo.Title: Necessary Evil
ComicInfo.Summary:
NECESSARY EVIL continues as Jason begins to remember the truth about Shattered Grid - and he begins the path to forming a new, covert team of Power Rangers.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Main Cover | Ivan Shavrin | 1 | B | Preorder Variant Cover | Miguel Mercado (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 2 | Var | 1:20 Album Variant Cover | Amelia Vidal | 3 | Var | Social Variant Cover | Johanna the Mad (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 4 | *Notes:* The 1:20 Album Variant Cover is a homage of the album cover for Weezer's Weezer (blue album).
